description: A colorful infographic depicting a person standing in a field surrounded by various insects, representing vector-borne diseases. The infographic should clearly show a shield protecting the person from the insects, symbolizing the coverage provided by the policy. The text 'Individual and Floater Sum Coverage' should be prominently displayed.

A vintage insurance policy document with a prominent heading 'Insured Options' and a detailed section outlining a 60-day waiting period for all vector-borne diseases, except [insert specific exceptions here]. The document should have a worn and faded aesthetic, suggesting it's been handled frequently.

A person holding a medical insurance policy document, with the words 'Malaria' and '30-day waiting period' clearly visible. The policy document should have a sleek, modern design and feature a prominent image of a mosquito. The overall tone should be professional and reassuring.

A whimsical illustration depicting a calendar with 30 days highlighted in green and 60 days in red. The calendar should have a friendly, cartoonish face, perhaps with a worried expression. In the background, a small clock ticks away, symbolizing the passage of time. The overall style should be playful and engaging, capturing the tension between the grace period and the deadline.

A retro-style poster advertising a sale with a bold headline saying "20% Off Online!" and an illustration of a clock with a hand pointing to the word "cooling-off" and a pile of money with a 20% discount tag. The background should be a vibrant color with a vintage texture.

A colorful infographic illustrating the key benefits of a company's health insurance policy. The infographic should include visual elements such as icons representing vector-borne diseases, graphs showing coverage details, and happy employees enjoying their health benefits.

A vibrant infographic illustrating the impact of Dengue Fever and Filariasis on a community, highlighting the lump sum benefit provided for treatment and prevention. The infographic should incorporate elements of healthcare, disease prevention, and financial support, with a positive and hopeful tone.

A person sitting at a desk, looking worried. They have a stack of papers in front of them, and one of the papers reads 'Claim Denied.' The background is a blurry image of a hospital, with medical equipment visible.
A hand holding a smartphone displaying a digital insurance policy, with the headline 'Maximum coverage up to 10 lakh rupees!' and a button labeled 'Access your policy now.'

A person holding a smartphone displaying the Insurance Wallet app, with a bright, modern interface showing the user's insurance information and a clear, easy-to-read premium rate breakdown. The scene should be set in a contemporary office environment, emphasizing convenience and accessibility.

A stylized illustration of a family standing in front of a house with a large, red 'X' over it. The family is smiling and holding hands, while the 'X' represents the absence of rebates offered by their new insurance policy. The background should have a vibrant, colorful style with a whimsical feel.

A formal legal document with the text 'minimum entry ages of 18 years for the proposer, spouse, and dependent' prominently displayed. The document should be on official-looking paper with a seal and signature, and have a vintage aesthetic. Render the scene in a realistic and detailed style, highlighting the importance and formality of the document.

A happy family of four, including parents and two children, standing in front of a house with a large 'Family Floater' sign in the yard. The parents are smiling and pointing at the sign, while the children are playing playfully in front of them. The overall tone of the image should be joyful and positive, conveying the feeling of security and protection provided by family floater insurance.
